settings.title: About Us
settings.subheading: Join the Network That Powers Baseball’s Future

settings.text:
The Baseball Industry Network (BIN) is the largest, most diverse, and influential online community in baseball — connecting over 40,000 members across the professional, amateur, and business sectors of the game.

From MLB and MiLB staff to agents, vendors, students, and sports professionals, BIN serves as a trusted hub for career advancement, collaboration, and community within the baseball industry.

Founded by Tyrone Brooks, a respected industry leader with decades of front-office experience and a Major League Baseball veteran, BIN has empowered thousands to build meaningful connections, gain career opportunities, and grow professionally through its digital community, partnerships, and in-person meetups held throughout the year.

settings.title: OUR MISSION
settings.text:
To empower, connect, and support professionals across all levels of the baseball industry by providing access toopportunities, mentorship, and community.

BIN fosters adiverse and inclusive networkthat champions professional growth, collaboration, and the ongoing development of the game — on and off the field.

settings.title: OUR VISION
settings.text:
The Baseball Industry Network strives to be the leading platform for career growth, connection, and inclusion within the baseball world.

Through innovation, collaboration, and a commitment to diversity, BIN will unify professionals, elevate talent, and shape the future of baseball’s global workforce.

settings.subtitle: Join the Network That Powers Baseball’s Future
settings.title: Key Benefits for BIN Members
settings.text:
Premier & Elite Members unlock access to:

  • Exclusive Job Board with early access to postings
  • Private BIN Digital Community & Resource Library
  • 1:1 Mentorships & Executive Leadership Chats
  • Monthly Podcasts, Webinars, and Virtual Events
  • BIN-Branded Welcome Kits & Seasonal Merchandise Drops
  • Discounts from official BIN partners, vendors, and sponsors

settings.title: Our Strategic Objectives
settings.text:
• Launch a three-tier membership model — Basic (Free), Premier ($99), and Elite ($149) — offering members increasing levels of access, exclusivity, and mentorship.
  • Build a secure digital platform, e-commerce store, and CRM to enhance user experience and streamline engagement.
  • Activate engagement around key baseball calendar moments such as Spring Training, Opening Day, All-Star Week, and the Winter Meetings.
  • Align with MLB’s DEI, hiring, and mentorship initiatives to create pathways for emerging and diverse talent.
  • Foster ongoing collaboration between teams, leagues, vendors, and partners.
